Lolina requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, wooden spoon, fry pan and vegetable oil to help her run the business.

She will use her profit to expand her business. She became a member of SPBD in 2012.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, wooden spoon, fry pan, vegetable oil.

loans.name: Tirso

texts.en:
Tirso highly appreciates your kind generosity, dear lenders. Your previous loan worth 30,000 PHP enabled him to buy spare parts for his jeepney unit and paid for its regular maintenance routine. It resulted in a more efficient transportation service and gave higher income for his family. It was a big help in their daily needs and children’s college education. Thank you so much!

He was able to pay his previous loan faithfully. This time, his jeepney needs a transmission repair. Hence, he is asking for a 35,000 PHP loan. He will use it to pay for the parts and labor, and buy new tires, oil and diesel. He's positive that you will again consider his request. He has good integrity to maintain his capacity to repay.

Tirso continuously meets with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of their work every week. It is where he can also draw strength and inspiration from God. *All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study God, build social capital and repay their microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for transmission repair and buy new tires, oil and diesel.

loans.name: Isah

texts.en:
Isah is a maize farmer from Kanawa village. As a Babban Gona member, Isah is excited to have access to a trained agronomist and superior inputs that will give him the chance to achieve high yields of up to 8 metric tons of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times higher than the average Nigerian farmer.

Before joining Babban Gona, Isah would have had to sell his maize at harvest, when the price of maize is at its lowest, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. As a Babban Gona member, Isah can store the maize he harvests and delay its sale until a period later on in the season when he can obtain the best price for his maize at a premium of up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

Thanks to the support from Babban Gona’s marketing services, Isah no longer feels the pressure to sell his maize at low harvest prices. With the opportunity to earn up to $2,000 per hectare of land, Isah hopes to realize better yields and plans on using his additional income to purchase a motorbike and do business with it.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Hauwa

texts.en:
Hauwa is a Babban Gona maize farmer. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Hauwa is thankful that days of poor yields are long gone. As a Babban Gona member, she has the opportunity to achieve yields of up to 8 metric tons of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times the yield of the average Nigerian farmer.

Traditionally, Hauwa would have had to sell her maize for low prices at harvest to meet her immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With Babban Gona’s support, Hauwa will store the maize she harvests and delay its sale until a date later in the season when she can obtain a significantly higher price for her maize at a premium up to 37% more than the harvest price.

With the opportunity to earn up to $2,000 per hectare of land, Hauwa now has the opportunity to actualize her dream to grow her agriculture business for herself and family members and would like to use this additional income to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Ummaru

texts.en:
Ummaru is a maize farmer from Maikano village. As a member of Babban Gona, Ummaru is excited about the opportunity to become a better farmer. With Babban Gona’s support, he has the chance to attain yields of up to 8 metric tons of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times the average yield in Nigeria.

Before joining Babban Gona, Ummaru would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With Babban Gona’s support, Ummaru can store his maize and sell it in the future for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

Ummaru is grateful to be part of the Babban Gona family and in the end hopes to use his increased earnings to build a house for his family

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Faatoe

texts.en:
Faatoe is a 46-year-old mother with two children. She runs a small business of selling taro and banana in her village to earn a living.

Faatoe requested a loan to buy taro roots (seedling), banana tube (seedling), wheelbarrow, rake, shovel and hand gloves to help her run the business.

She hopes to use her profit to expand her business and provide for her family needs. She became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy taro roots (seedling), banana tube (seedling), wheelbarrow, rake, shovel and hand gloves.

loans.name: Tuatuamamao

texts.en:
Tuatuamamao is a 43-year-old mother with nine children. She owns and operates a small business of selling elei printing materials at the market to earn a living.

Tuatuamamao requested a loan to buy rolling materials, paint color, paint brush, elei design, containers and a printing machine to assist her in running the business.

She has been doing this for more than two years. She will use her profit to expand her business. She became a member of SPBD in 2013.

loans.use: to buy rolling materials, paint color, paint brush, elei design, containers, printing machine

loans.name: Yakubu

texts.en:
Yakubu is a Babban Gona maize farmer. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Yakubu is thankful that days of poor yields are long gone. As a Babban Gona member, he has the opportunity to achieve yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times the yield of the average Nigerian farmer.

Traditionally, Yakubu would have had to sell his maize for low prices at harvest to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With Babban Gona’s support, Yakubu will store the maize he harvests and delay its sale until a date later in the season when he can obtain a significantly higher price for his maize at a premium up to 37% more than the harvest price.

With the opportunity to earn up to $2000 per Hectare of land, Yakubu now has the opportunity to actualize his dream of growing his agriculture business for himself and family members and would like to use this additional income to ensure that all his children get a postsecondary education.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Suesa

texts.en: Suesa is a 44-year-old mother with eight children. She owns and operates a small business selling elei printing materials at the market to earn a living. Suesa requested a loan to buy rolling materials, paint color, paint brushes, elei designs, containers and a printing machine to assist her in running the business. She will use her profit to develop her business. She became a member of SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy rolling materials, paint color, paint brushes, elei designs, containers and a printing machine.

loans.name: Yakubu

texts.en:
Yakubu is a Babban Gona maize farmer. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Yakubu is thankful that days of poor yields are long gone. As a Babban Gona member, he has the opportunity to achieve yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times the yield of the average Nigerian farmer.

Traditionally, Yakubu would have had to sell his maize for low prices at harvest to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With Babban Gona’s support, Yakubu will store the maize he harvests and delay its sale until a date later in the season when he can obtain a significantly higher price for his maize at a premium up to 37% more than the harvest price.

With the opportunity to earn up to $2000 per Hectare of land, Yakubu now has the opportunity to actualize his dream to grow his agriculture business for himself and family members and would like to use this additional income to move into a better home with his family.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Bruno

texts.es:
El socio Bruno pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE LIMA”;  el socio sigue dedicándose  al negocio de venta de ropa, el socio lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio es una persona responsable y espera poder obtener más ganancias en su negocio para de esta manera poder continuar apoyando a su familia, él socio desea poder  seguir trabajando para de esta forma continuar apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para comprar pantalones entre otros.
texts.en:
This client, Bruno, is a member of the communal bank "Santa Rosita de Lima". He continues running his clothing sales business, which he has had for a long time and is going well, thanks to the effort he puts into it every day. 
Bruno is a responsible person and he hopes to make more money through his business so that he can continue supporting his family. He hopes to be able to continue working in this way in order to continue supporting his family. 
He requests the loan to purchase pants and other items.

loans.use: to purchase pants, among other things.

loans.name: Pouono

texts.en: Pouono is 52 years old with 10 children. She runs a business selling taro and banana chips in her community to earn a living. Pouono requested a loan to buy a sack of taro, bananas, vegetable oil, a fry pan and a wooden spoon to assist her with the business. She will use her profit to expand her business and provide her family's daily needs. She joined SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy a sack of taro, bananas, vegetable oil, a fry pan and a wooden spoon.

loans.name: Rhoda

texts.en:
Rhoda is a Babban Gona maize farmer. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Rhoda is thankful that days of poor yields are long gone. As a Babban Gona member, she has the opportunity to achieve yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times the yield of the average Nigerian farmer.

Traditionally, Rhoda would have had to sell her maize for low prices at harvest to meet her immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With Babban Gona’s support, Rhoda will store the maize she harvests and delay its sale until a date later in the season when she can obtain a significantly higher price for her maize at a premium up to 37% more than the harvest price.

With the opportunity to earn up to $2000 per hectare of land, Rhoda now has the opportunity to actualize her dream of growing her agriculture business for herself and family members and would like to use this additional income to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Tali

texts.en: Tali is a 28-year-old mother with four children, and has a small business of selling vegetables (cabbage, eggplant and cucumbers) in her community to earn a living. Tali requested a loan to buy vegetable seeds, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, water tank, rake, shovel, hand gloves and safety boots to assist her in running the business. She will expand her business using her profit. She became a member of SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, water tank, rake, shovel, hand gloves and safety boots.

loans.name: Rene Rodolfo

texts.es: Rene de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija, el posee un taller de mecánica automotriz ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace 20 años, tiene muchos clientes por su buen trabajo, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el cliente está solicitando un crédito para la compra de una caja de herramientas, micas y sostenes o burros de motores ya que los que actualmente posee están muy deteriorados, ya si poder para seguir con su trabajo para tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Rene is 40 years old and lives in his own home with his daughter. He owns a mechanic shop which he has run out of his home for the past 20 years. He has many clients, thanks to the quality of his work, and with what he earns through the business he is able to cover some household expenses.
Rene is requesting a loan to purchase a toolkit, as well as headlight covers, car bras and car jacks because the ones he currently possesses are very deteriorated. With this he will be able to continue his work and increase his earnings.

loans.use: to purchase motor repair tools and supplies.

loans.name: Marie Roseleine

texts.fr: Roseleine, 41 ans, est propriétaire d’une petite épicerie à domicile. Cette activité est le gagne-pain de la famille. Elle y gagne des revenus pour payer la scolarité de ses deux enfants et pour répondre à d’autres besoins. A l’avenir, elle gagner assez de revenus pour pouvoir faire de l’épargne.
texts.en:
Roseleine is forty-one years old and owns a small grocery store which she runs from her home. This business is the main money-earner for her family. She earns enough to pay for schooling for her two children and also provide for their other needs.

In the future, Roseleine hopes to earn enough to increase her savings levels.

loans.use: to buy food products for sale in her shop.

loans.name: Wendlamsoaba Group

texts.fr: Zenabo, est une femme âgée de 34 ans mariée mère de 5 enfants dont tous scolarisés. Elle exerce son activité depuis 8 ans. Ce qui fait marcher son activité c'est son dynamisme, sa disponibilité, elle vend de la bonne qualité du gravion et du sable. Elle veut le prêt pour acheter le gravion à 75 000, et le sable à 75 000 f. L'utilité du prêt c'est de s'approvisionner en quantité suffisante afin de renforcer son activité. Elle a déjà reçu le prêt une fois et à rembourser à la bonne date prévue à ACFIME
texts.en:
Zenabo is thirty-four years old, married and mother to five children who all attend school. She has been running her business selling high quality gravel and sand for eight years, and it is successful due to her dynamism and her approachability.

Zenabo has requested this loan to buy gravel for 75,000 francs CFA and sand for 75,000 francs CFA. This will improve her stock levels and help to strengthen her business. She has already received one loan from the field partner, ACFIME, which was repaid on time.

loans.use: to buy gravel and sand for her business.

loans.name: Marie Lenessa

texts.fr: Lenessa est âgée de 30 ans. Elle est célibataire et sans enfant à charge. Elle a un tout petit commerce sucreries. Elle souhaite agrandir la petite activité et multiplier ses revenus. Elle demande un prêt qu’elle compte utiliser dans l’achat de sacs de sucreries pour augmenter son stock.
texts.en:
Lenessa is thirty years old, single and is not responsible for any children. She owns a very small sweetshop which she would like to expand to increase her earnings.

Lenessa has requested a loan to buy more bags of sweets to increase her stock levels.

loans.use: to increase her stock of sweets.

loans.name: Mimose

texts.fr: Mimose a vingt ans d’expérience dans la revente de produits alimentaires. Agée de 53 ans, divorcée, elle doit pourvoir à ses quatre enfants la nourriture, les vêtements et les frais scolaires. Elle cherche un coup de pouce financier pour agrandir son activité et augmenter ses revenus.
texts.en:
Mimose is fifty-three years old, divorced and has four children. She is responsible for paying for food, clothing and school fees for her children.

Mimose has twenty years experience selling food products and has requested this loan to support her goal of expanding her business and increasing her earnings.

loans.use: to buy food products for sale on her stall.

loans.name: Joliette

texts.fr: Joliette revend des sandales depuis 10 ans. Agée de 35 ans, divorcée et mère de deux enfants, elle travaille sans relâche pour procurer les nécessaires à sa famille. Elle demande un prêt pour augmenter son stock. A l’avenir, elle compte vendre aussi des vêtements.
texts.en:
Joliette is thirty-five years old, divorced and mother to two children. She works very hard to provide for all the needs of her family. To do this, she has been selling sandals for ten years.

Joliette has requested this loan to increase her stock levels. In the future, she would like to begin also selling clothing.

loans.use: to buy a large stock of sandals.

loans.name: Mireille

texts.fr: Mireille est âgée de 55 ans. Elle est divorcée et vit avec ses deux enfants dans la ville de Croix-des-Bouquets. Pour générer un peu de revenus pour prendre soin de sa famille, elle revend des boissons gazeuses. Cette activité marche très bien dans la zone, mais elle fait régulièrement face à des ruptures de stock. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock.
texts.en:
Mireille is fifty-five years old, divorced and lives with her two children in the town of Croix-des-Bouquets. In order to generate some revenue and take care of her family, she sells fizzy soft drinks. Her business is very successful but she often runs out of stock.

Mireille has requested this loan to increase her stock levels.

loans.use: to increase her stock levels of drinks.

loans.name: Lifaite

texts.fr: Lifaite a 35 ans. Elle a une activité de revente de vêtements pour femme. Elle tien cette activité depuis une dizaine d’années. Au début, la situation était très difficile, elle arrivait difficilement à renouveler son stock. Depuis qu’elle utilise les microcrédits, elle ne connaît plus de rupture de stock. Le crédit l’aide beaucoup à faire progresser son commerce.
texts.en: Lifaite is thirty-five years old and has been running a business selling women's clothing for around ten years now.  In the beginning it was very difficult, she found it very hard to pay to replenish her stock levels.  Since she has been working with the field partner, however, she has successfully avoided running out of stock.  This loan will really help her to improve and develop her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of clothing for women.

loans.name: Jeanne

texts.fr: Jeanne est âgée de 51 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de quatre enfants. Elle revend des produits alimentaires. Elle a commencé il y a douze ans de cela. Mais comme pour toute activité au début, la situation était très difficile. Elle s’est débattue de toutes ses forces pour faire survivre l’activité. Maintenant, à l’aide des crédits, elle fait bien de progrès. Elle demande un prêt pour augmenter son stock.
texts.en:
Jeanne is fifty-one years old, married and mother to four children. She has been selling food products for twelve years. However, as for most businesses, in the beginning it was very difficult. She had to fight with all her ability to keep her business going.

Nowadays, Jeanne works with the field partner and the loans she has received have helped her improve her business. This loan will be used to increase her stock levels.

loans.use: to buy boxes of eggs for sale.

loans.name: Rose Mitha

texts.fr: Rose Mitha a 44 ans et elle vit dans la ville de Delmas. Elle est divorcée, elle a deux enfants et elle vend des produits alimentaires depuis une vingtaine d’années. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock de produits alimentaires et satisfaire les besoins de sa clientèle.
texts.en:
Rose Mitha is forty-four years old, divorced and has two children. She lives in the town of Delmas and has been selling food products for around twenty years.

Rose Mitha has requested this loan to increase her stock levels of food products and respond to the demands of her customers.

loans.use: to buy food products for sale.

loans.name: Eveline

texts.fr: Eveline est veuve et elle a cinq enfants. Elle a 55 ans et pour subvenir à ses besoins, elle vend des produits alimentaires au marché public de son quartier. Elle vend du riz, des haricots, des petits pois, des épices, etc. Son rêve est de développer l’activité pour en tirer plus de bénéfices. Elle demande donc un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock. A l’avenir, elle espère subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Eveline is fifty-five years old, widowed and has five children. She sells food products at the public market in her neighbourhood. She sells rice, beans, peas, spices, etc.

Eveline's dream is to develop her business and earn more revenue. She has requested this loan to increase her stock levels. In the future, she would like to be able to provide for the needs of her children.

loans.use: to buy sacks of beans, rice and spices.

loans.name: Marcula

texts.fr: Marcula a 43 ans. Elle revend de produits cosmétiques et extensions pour cheveux. C’est une activité très rentable. Pour éviter des ruptures de stock, Marcula sollicite souvent du crédit. Ces crédits contribuent beaucoup dans le progrès de son activité.
texts.en: Marcula is forty-three years old and sells cosmetic products and hair extensions.  Her business is very profitable.  In order to avoid running out of stock, Marcula has requested a loan.  Her loans are very important to develop her business.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products for sale.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge, de 54 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador, estudio hasta segundo grado, no siguió estudiando por ayudarle a sus padres con los oficios del hogar y trabajar para llevar el sustento a su familia; actualmente vive junto a su pareja y dos nietos.

Jorge, se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde pequeño y fue su padre quien le enseño este oficio; ahora es su principal fuente de ingresos y el sustento para su familia.

Jorge, necesita el préstamo para cambiar su equipo de pesca porque ya termino su vida útil.

Jorge, sueña con seguir trabajando y lograr que sus nietos estudien y se preparen academicamente.
texts.en:
Jorge is 54 years old. He is hard-working. Jorge has a second-grade education; he did not continue with his education so that he could help his parents with household chores and work to support his family. Jorge currently lives with his partner and two grandchildren.

Jorge has been a small-time fisherman since he was young. He learned the trade from his father. Now this trade is Jorge and his family's main source of income.

Jorge needs this loan in order to replace his fishing equipment, which is no longer fit for use.

Jorge dreams of continuing to work and seeing his grandchildren study and get an education.

loans.use: to replace his fishing equipment, which is no longer fit for use.

loans.name: Alexis

texts.es:
Alexis, de 23 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor, estudio hasta cuarto grado, actualmente vive con su pareja y sus 2 hijos.

Alexis, se dedica a la pesca artesanal, este negocio lo aprendió desde que tenía diez años de edad, él se embarcaba junto a su padre y fue él quien le enseño el trabajo de la pesca y ahora es una de las principales fuentes de ingresos de su familia.

Alexis, necesita el préstamo para cambiar su equipo de pesca, porque ya está en buenas condiciones y las redes no atrapan muchos pescados.

Alexis, desea ver crecer a sus hijos y que estudien para que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Alexis is 23 years old. He is hard-working and enterprising. He has a fourth-grade education. He currently lives with his partner and two children.

Alexis is a small-time fisherman, a trade he started learning when he was ten years old. Alexis use to go out with his father, who taught him to fish, and it is now one of his family's main sources of income.

Alexis needs this loan in order to replace his fishing equipment. His current equipment is not in great condition and does not catch many fish.

Alexis wants to see his children grow up and for them to study and learn a profession.

loans.use: to replace his fishing equipment.

loans.name: Buuzainap

texts.ru: Буузайнап, 62 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитала 4 детей. Сейчас на пенсии, 25 лет назад начала заниматься сельским хозяйством. Ее ежемесячный доход составляет 29,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве есть корова, 10 овец. В целях расширения ее бизнеса, Буузайнап обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 коров с телятами. Буузайнап планирует вложить доходы от бизнеса в дальнейшее увеличение ее дела, а также в будущем намерена собрать денежные средства на улучшение жилищных условий.
texts.en: Buuzainap is 62 years old and married.  She and her husband have raised four children.  Buuzainap is now retired.  She started working in agriculture 25 years ago and now makes a monthly income of 29,000 som (KGS).  She has one cow and 10 sheep on her farm.  In order to expand her business, she has turned to Kiva's partner, Bai Tushum Bank, and requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy two cows with their calves.  She is planning to use the earnings from her business to further increase her activity.  In the future, she also intends to save enough money to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy two cows with their calves in order to increase her livestock headcount.

loans.name: Rosa Mabel

texts.es:
Rosa, de 45 años de edad, es una mujer luchadora y trabajadora, es madre soltera y ella sola ha sacado a sus hijos adelante, ella estudio hasta noveno grado, su hijo tiene 16 años de edad y vive con ella y su otra hija residen en los Estados Unidos de Norte América.

Rosa, se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 3 años y es de ese negocio de donde genera los ingresos necesarios para su familia.- Anteriormente, trabajaba en un bazar de ropa y aparte de eso también tenía su propio negocio de venta de tortillas; pero surgió la idea de poner su propio negocio y está obteniendo buenos resultados.

Rosa, necesita el préstamo para construir un pequeño cafetín para vender golosinas y otros artículos de primera necesidad. 

Su sueño de Rosa, es tener un negocio más fuerte y asì mejorar los ingresos familiares para tener una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Rosa, 45, is a hard-working and tenacious woman. She is a single mother and she has raised her children on her own. She studied until ninth grade. One son is 16 and lives with her, while her daughter lives in the USA.

Rosa has been selling clothes for three years and this business allows her to generate a steady income for her family needs. She used to work in a clothes store and she also had a business on the side selling tortillas.

However, she got the idea to start her own business and she is now reaping the benefits. She needs this loan to build a small snack bar so that she can sell candy and a selection of groceries.

She dreams of having a stronger business and being able to generate more income so her family can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to build a small snack bar where she can sell snacks and groceries.

loans.name: Nora Esther

texts.es: Nora de 65 años es una confeccionista empírica que reside en un barrio de Soledad, es madre de 5 hijos de 47, 46, 43, 42 y 33 años de edad que los educó y formó en un hogar monoparental al encontrarse separada de su cónyuge. Esta valerosa mujer aprendió a confeccionar ropa de cama, observando a su hermana una modista profesional que confecciona todo tipo de prendas, ella tomó la máquina de su hermana y empezó a coser sin ninguna preparación adicional a lo que había logrado percibir de los procedimientos de su hermana. En la actualidad ella elabora sábanas, edredones y almohadas para toda la familia, que comercializa en diferentes barrios de Barranquilla en donde residen conocidos y amigos.  Sus compras las realiza en almacenes especializados en telas y compra retazos que le sirven para realizar combinaciones del gusto de sus clientes. Su negocio ha sido muy próspero y su meta es mejorar las máquinas de coser que actualmente tiene para lograr mejores acabados y una producción más eficiente. Nora realizó una solicitud de crédito, un credikiva, oportunidad para vincularse a la vida financiera a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo que invertirá en telas para continuar confeccionando sin inconvenientes y aprovechar la temporada decembrina en la que sus clientes le solicitan sus productos.
texts.en:
Nora, 65, is an experienced seamstress who lives in the neigborhood of Soledad, She is the mother of five children aged 47, 46, 43, 42 and 33. She raised and educated all of her children as a single mother, as she is separated from her husband.

This courageous woman learnt how to make bedclothes by watching her sister work. She was a professional tailor who made all kinds of clothes. Nora started to use her sister's sewing machine and taught herself how to use it, putting the knowledge she had picked up from her sister into use.

Currently, she makes bedsheets, quilts and pillows for all the family. She sells her products in the neighboring areas of Barranquilla, where her friends and acquaintances live.

She buys her material in specialized stores and she picks up small pieces so she can make combinations that her customers like.

Her business has been very prosperous and her goal now is to get better sewing machines than the ones she has right now. This will help her add better quality finishes to her products and work more efficiently.

Nora already applied for a loan through Kiva, working with the credit group Mario Santo Domingo foundation. She will use the loan to carry on in business and make the most of the December period when there is demand from her customers.

loans.use: to buy material to make bedclothes.

loans.name: Ismoil

texts.ru: Исмоил молодой отец и верный муж. Ему 25 лет. Исмоил 2 года назад стал отцом и с того дня его жизнь перевернулась верх наголову. Исмоил начал к жизни относится гораздо серьезнее и уже думает не только о себе, но и о своей жене и ребенке. Он несет ответственность за свою семью. Исмоил не нашел хорошую работу в маленьком районе и как многие мужчины должен был уехать на заработки. Но Исмоил очень любит свою жену и ребенка, и поэтому он все еще на Родине. Исмоил принял решение начать собственный бизнес. Он будет заниматься животноводством. В Таджикистане прекрасный климат для животноводческой, деятельность способствующий к здоровому росту и развитию животных. Для начала бизнеса Исмоилу нужны инвестиции. Он надеется что с кредитом он сможет и начать деятельность и остаться с семьей.
texts.en:
Ismoil, 25, is a devoted husband and young father. He became a father two years ago and, since that day, his life was turned upside down.  He started to take life much more seriously and he now thinks not just about himself but also about his wife and child.  He feels responsible for his family.  Ismoil was not able to find a good job in his small district so, like many men, he thought about leaving his country to find work elsewhere.  However, he loves his wife and child very much and, for this reason, he is still in Tajikistan.

Ismoil has decided to start his own animal husbandry business. Tajikistan enjoys a beautiful climate, which is very favorable to raising livestock and conducive to the healthy growth and breeding of domestic animals.  Ismoil needs some funds to start his new business.  He hopes that this loan will help him to start his new activity and will allow him to stay with his family.

loans.use: to start his animal husbandry business.

loans.name: Anselma

texts.es:
Anselma con 53 años de edad, de estado civil casada,vive junto a su esposo, en el distrito de Oyotún,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú, en una zona rural. Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto comerciales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a las labores de costurera y bordados, con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio,su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Solicita préstamo para mejoramiento de infraestructura donde se encuentran su negocio, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mejores condiciones para su trabajo, con gran influencia en el negocio. De esta manera piensa mejorar las condiciones de su local para poder atender las diversas necesidades y gustos de los clientes de la zona.

Anselma es socia recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa. Ha tenido dos créditos de S/.1500,00 y S/. 2501,00 los cuáles los a cancelado de manera puntual. Desde que se convirtió en cliente de nosotros su negocio ha mejorado y su calidad de vida de igual forma.
texts.en:
Anselma, 53, is married and lives with her husband in Oyotun, Chiclayo in Peru. This area falls under the Lambayeque office. It is a rural area, where the majority of the population work in agriculture, commerce or livestock.

Anselma is highly regarded in the area, both as a person and as a professional. She earns a living sewing and doing embroidery. She has more than five years' experience in this business and she works from home.

She is asking for a loan to make improvements to her house, so that she can work in better conditions. This will help her work better and be able to attend to the different needs of her customers in the area.

She has been in the loan system before with Edpyme Alternativa. She has had two loans; one for 1500 nuevos soles and the other for 2501 nuevos soles. She paid both of these loans off on time.

Since she has been a client with the credit group, her business and personal life have improved together.

loans.use: make building improvements to her home and business place.

loans.name: Gladis Geovani

texts.es: Gladis de 35 años de edad,  estado civil soltera, tiene un hijo Miguel Ángel de 14 años de edad estudia en un colegio del sector, vino desde Colombia a buscar una fuente de ingresos para poder satisfacer las necesidades básicas de su familia, hace 10 años confecciona y arregla  todo tipo de ropa. Gladis necesita el dinero para adquirir una maquina facilitaría y aumentaría sus ingresos para poder seguir cubriendo los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Gladis, 35, is single and has a son called Miguel Angel who is 14. Her son studies in a local school.

She came to Ecuador from Colombia, looking for a better source of income so she could satisfy the basic needs of her family. She has been making and repairing clothes for ten years.

She is asking for a loan to buy a sewing machine which will make her life easier and improve her profits so she can continue to meet the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 29 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace 4 años, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por mayor y cal para poder continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos economicos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This young woman aged 29 has her face blurred in the photo because she lives in a high risk area.

She has had a tortilla business for four years. She works from home and has many customers. She uses the profits to pay for some of the household expenses.

She is asking for a loan to buy a large quantity of corn and lime powder, so she can carry on making her tortillas. As a result, she can generate an income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale and lime powder.

loans.name: Cleronite

texts.fr: Cleronite est âgée de 60 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 3 enfants. Depuis 25 ans, elle fait le commerce de produits alimentaires et d’articles divers chez elle dans une petite boutique qu’elle a aménagée. Bien installée dans le quartier, sa boutique est très fréquentée. En dépit des obstacles économiques auxquels elle peut faire face, elle parvient à garder sa clientèle. Cleronite souhaite agrandir davantage son commerce et augmenter son revenu. Craignant une éventuelle rupture de stock, elle a fait une demande de microcrédit afin d’augmenter ses marchandises.
texts.en: Cleronite is 60 years old.  She is married and the mother of three children.  She has been selling food products and various other goods for 25 years and has created a small shop inside her home where she sells her merchandise.   Popular in her neighborhood, her shop is visited by many customers.  In spite of some economic hurdles that she has to face, Cleronite always finds a way to retain her customer base.  She now wants to expand her business and increase her income.  Fearing a potential stock shortage, she is taking this micro-loan in order to boost her inventory.

loans.use: to buy boxes of butter and bags of sugar.

loans.name: Marie Francine

texts.fr: Francine est âgée de 43 ans. Elle est divorcée et n’a pas d’enfant. Comme elle ne parvient pas à trouver du travail, elle a entrepris d’ouvrir sa propre activité. Il y 5 ans de cela, elle a ouvert un commerce de produits alimentaires au marché public de son quartier. Grâce à cette activité, elle gagne assez d'argent pour subvenir aux dépenses de la famille. Aujourd'hui, elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock.
texts.en: Francine is 43 years old.  She is divorced, with no children.  Since she couldn't find a job, she decided five years ago to start her own business. She now sells food products at the public market in her neighborhood.  Thanks to this activity, she earns enough money to cover her family's expenses.  She is taking this micro-loan in order to increase her stock of merchandise.

loans.use: to buy crates of oil and bags of rice.

loans.name: Marthe

texts.fr: Marthe a 54 ans. Elle est veuve et mère d’un enfant indépendant. Cela fait plus de 10 ans depuis qu’elle vend des sucreries et d'autres produits alimentaires chez elle. Cette activité, qui est sa seule source de revenus, lui permet de prendre soin d’elle. Marthe a déjà bénéficié de prêts qui l’ont aidée à faire avancer sa petite boutique. Elle souhaite agrandir son commerce et pouvoir mieux répondre à ses besoins quotidiens. Aujourd'hui elle sollicite un microcrédit en vue d’augmenter son stock.
texts.en: Marthe is a 54-year-old widow and the mother of one child who is now independent.  She has been selling sweets and other food products from home for over 10 years now.  Thanks to this activity - her only source of income - she is able to support herself. Marthe has already taken loans which have helped her to grow her small retail business.  She now wants to expand her activity and better meet her day-to-day needs.  She is taking this micro-loan in order to increase her stock of goods.

loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Savalan

texts.en:
Savalan is 41 years old and is a refugee from Bilasuvar region. He is married and has a son and 2 daughters. Savalan's extended family is large because he also support his ageing parents and younger siblings. He is a very hard-working member in his family. Savalan is a diligent person. He is trying to earn enough income as a farmer raising cattle and sheep. This way he takes care of his family's needs. He is a very energetic and passionate about his job. There are many people in the local market who respect Savalan for his dedication, honesty and right principles of doing business. He is a well known farmer who does great job to meet his customers' needs.

Savalan also has a small shop where he brings meat to sell in the market. In the local market there aren't many people who can provide real meat. Thats why people like buying from him. Savalan is planning to expand because of growing demand in the market, as people prefer traditional food like kufta and bozbash which consists of mutton and beef. Currently he needs a 1200 AZN loan to buy 3 calves. Hopefully KIVA lenders will support him.

loans.use: to buy 3 calves.

loans.name: Jose Gabriel

texts.es:
José, está casado, su esposa tiene 35 años de edad, y tienen tres hijos con edades de 15, 10 y 7 años de edad, todos se dedican a la venta de semilla de marañón al por mayor, lo comercializan es en el mercado municipal de su localidad.
Solicita un crédito para poderlo invertir en la compra de bolsas de empaque, semillas de marañón, leña, dulce entre otros, esto le ayudara al fortalecimiento del negocio y a cumplir con pedidos que ya tiene, espera tener nuevos ingresos con los que piensa cubrir algunas necesidades de ella y su familia.
Uno de sus sueños ampliar su negocio para aportar más en los gastos familiares.
texts.en: José is married and his wife is 35-years old. They have three children ages 15, 10 and 7. They all work selling cashews wholesale in a town market where he lives. He is asking for a loan to buy packing bags, cashews, firewood, sweets and others. This will help to strengthen the business and to fulfill the orders he already has. He hopes to have new income which he plans to use to cover some of his and his family's needs. One of his dreams is to grow his business to contribute more to the family expenses.

loans.use: to buy packing bags, cashews, firewood, sweets and others. This will help to strengthen the business and to fulfill the orders he already has.

loans.name: Maria Hilda

texts.es: Doña Maria de 63 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, tiene muchos clientes fijos por la calidad de la ropa y los buenos precios, ella está solicitando un crédito para la comprar de mas ropa por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y así poder tener mejore ingresos.
texts.en: Maria is 63-years old and lives in her own home with her family members. She works selling clothing on the streets in the different markets found close to her home. She has many regular customers for the quality of clothing and the good prices. She is asking for a loan to buy more wholesale clothing and be able to continue with her sales, thus being able to have a better income.

loans.use: to buy more wholesale clothing.

loans.name: Saima

texts.en:
SAIMA husband's owns a small video games club in the main city of Lahore, Pakistan where he offers many video games for people to play. There are many children who also play these games with joy. A few days ago, one the children's favorite games became out of order because of an electricity fluctuation. SAIMA's husband wants to replace the game console with a new one but doesn't have available funds to do so.

This is the reason why SAIMA has requested a Kiva loan on behalf of her husband.

SAIMA is very pleased after this loan was approved, and thanks Kiva, Kiva lenders and BRAC Pakistan for this honorable support.

loans.use: to buy one a children's game for her husband's video games club.

loans.name: Isabel María

texts.es: Isabel es una ama de casa residenciada en un barrio del sur de Barranquilla que decidió aprovechar su tiempo libre y realizar alguna actividad que le suministrara nuevos ingresos a su grupo familiar. Ella es oriunda de una población ubicada en el departamento del Magdalena donde la economía se rige con base a la agricultura y la ganadería, su familia se ha dedicado durante años al comercio de alimentos tradicionales en estas tierras; queso, suero y frutas, así que no dudo en ofrecer estos alimentos a vecinos, amigos y tiendas en el sur de Barraquilla, localidad donde reside. Con esta gama de alimentos obtuvo una buena acogida y el éxito de su negocio.  Ella recepciona los pedidos de sus clientes y semanalmente se los envían sus proveedores situados en  pueblos de la rivera del rio Magdalena. Sus ventas se realizan con pago inmediato, sin embargo también le ofrece facilidades de pago a sus clientes más fieles, sin embargo su capital no es muy extenso y por ello necesitó realizar una solicitud de crédito; un credikiva, oportunidad para vincularse a la vida financiera a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo e invertir en frutas de temporada, queso y suero, de este modo continuará en su negocio sin inconvenientes y podrá continuar beneficiando a su familia. Ella es madre de dos hijos y vela porque tengan estudios académicos de calidad, lo que no hubiese sido posible sin su aporte económico.
texts.en:
Isabel is a housewife located in a neighborhood south of Barranquilla who decided to take advantage of her free time and do a job that provides new income to her family. She is native to a town located in the department of Magdalena where the economy is ruled by agriculture and livestock. Her family has worked for years in selling traditional foods in these parts such as cheese, whey and fruits. So she did not hesitate to offer these foods to neighbors, friends and stores in the south of Barranquilla, where she lives.

She receives her customer's orders and sends them to her suppliers weekly, located in towns on the banks of the Magdalena River. She does her sales with immediate payment, however she offers credit to her most loyal customers. However, her capital is not very extensive and for that reason she needs to ask for a loan, a CrediKiva, for the opportunity to be rooted in financial life through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. She will buy seasonal fruit, cheese and whey. This way she can continue with the business without inconveniences and be able to continue benefitting her family. She is the mother of two children and fights so that they have quality academic studies, something that would not have been possible without your economic support.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruit, cheese and whey.

loans.name: Allah Rakhi

texts.en:
Allah Rakhi is 55 years old and lives in the rural area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is a mason by profession. He has been constructing buildings and houses for many years. He is an expert in his art and has constructed a lot of beautiful buildings during his career. The tools he uses, such as a brick trowel, buttering trowel, pointing trowel, hammer, chisel, jointer, chisel and level, have started to wear out. He wants to buy new tools to continue his construction services but does not have sufficient cash in hand to buy these tools.

Therefore, Allah Rakhi has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan; so that her husband can buy tools for construction.

Allah Rakhi is grateful to the Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy mason's tools such as bricks, trowels, hammers and chisels for her husband's construction work.

loans.name: Mussarat

texts.en:
MUSSARAT, aged 38, is a married woman. She is a hardworking and brave mother who is helping her family by providing tailoring services in her community. Being a mother, she wants to provide better facilities for her children, and this is the reason for her working extremely hard to keep her children smiling.

She started a clothes sewing business after the birth of her two children, when she observed that her husband couldn't provide everything necessary for them. Then she decided to start tailoring work at home and since then she has been sewing clothes for her community. She wants to enhance the beauty of her craft so she would like to buy a Juki sewing machine. The professionals use this machine for tailoring because of its speed and fine performance.

She knows the techniques of tailoring very well. Her regular customers are mostly her neighbors, relatives and the local community. She has requested a loan to buy a new Juki sewing machine and some packs of zippers and buttons to meet the increasing demand.

MUSSARAT is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a professional Juki sewing machine and some packs of zippers and buttons to continue her clothes sewing business.

loans.name: Mumtaz

texts.en:
MUMTAZ is a 36-year-old married woman. Her financial condition is not good. She has to think many times before starting any task. Now her husband has just started to drive a motor rickshaw (a type of three-wheeled rickshaw that includes a motorbike). He drives his rickshaw over local roads for small distances. Its body is made of polyester, which is not strong enough to bare the jerks on the roads. Now, the rickshaw body needs to be replaced because it rattles when its driven. This is the reason he wants to buy a new body for his motor rickshaw.

MUMTAZ has requested a loan so that her husband can buy a motor rickshaw body and drive the vehicle smoothly.

MUMTAZ thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a body for her husband's motor rickshaw which he uses in his transportation services on local roads.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge tiene 46 años de  edad, de estado civil divorciado vive con su hijo Ramiro que le ayuda en su pequeño taller  confeccionando pantalones  deportivos luego de que paso cinco años como empleado hace un año tomo la iniciativa de tener su propio negocio. Jorge necesita el dinero para comprar materia prima, así no se frenaría el negocio por la falta del mismo obtendría ingresos para pagar la alimentación, el lugar donde vive con su hijo.
texts.en: Jorge is 46-years old. He is divorced and lives with his son, Ramiro, who helps him in his small workshop making sport pants. After being employed for five years, a year ago he took the initiative to have his own business. Jorge needs the money to buy materials so that his business doesn't stop because he lacks money. He will get an income to pay for food and for the place where he lives with his son.

loans.use: to buy materials.

loans.name: Suriya

texts.en:
SURIYA, aged 47, lives in the area of Lahore, Pakistan and is the mother of two sons and a daughter. She has to work hard to feed her family. She owns a small tailoring business with her daughter helps with at home, to manage their household expenses. SURIYA and her daughter have been stitching clothes for many years. Her daughter has been helping and learning tailoring work with her, and has gained a lot of experience. So SURIYA wants to buy a new Juki sewing machine for her daughter, so that she can contribute to the family income from sewing clothes.

Therefore, SURIYA has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, to buy a new Juki sewing machine for her daughter. She also wants to set aside some savings so that she can arrange a marriage ceremony for her daughter. SURIYA thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a new Juki sewing machine for her daughter so she can also contribute to their monthly income.

loans.name: Maqsooda

texts.en:
MAQSOODA is a 38-year-old married woman who has five children. She lives in a populated area, and her husband knows about people's needs in this area. He is a market vendor who sells seasonal fruits from his place in a central bazaar and also from his home. He has a few years of experience in this field. He knows his customers' needs and he has reliable providers.

MAQSOODA's husband chose this business because it is profitable and brings in a stable income. People use fresh fruits every day and consider them healthy, and many national dishes are made of fruits. He wants to increase his stock on a daily basis so that he could sell the maximum amount of fruits till evening and get maximum reward for his efforts.

MAQSOODA applied for a loan so her husband can purchase more fruits and thus increase his monthly turnover. She thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy fresh and seasonal fruits for her husband's fruits selling business.

loans.name: Menime

texts.en:
Menime is 52 years old and married with 4 children. She lives in Samoa.

Menime owns and runs a canteen in her village and at schools. She has been running her business for 6 years now. She has excellent repayments records. Menime has requested for a loan to buy a freezer; boxes of chicken, tinned fish, vegetable oil, sausages and; sacks of flour, sugar and rice, to help her run the business. She became a member of SPBD in 2009.

loans.use: Menime has requested for a loan to buy a freezer; boxes of chicken, tinned fish, vegetable oil, sausages and; sacks of flour, sugar and rice for her canteen business.

loans.name: Ada Beatriz

texts.es:
Ada, es una mujer que se encuentra muy agradecida, ya que con el crédito anterior pudo cambiar su estilo de vida y el de su familia,  además ahora apoya mucho más a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.
Solicita nuevamente otro crédito para el fortalecimiento del negocio que consiste en un molino de nixtamal y tienda de productos básicos para el hogar, ella comprara fajas, gasolina, tolvas para el molino y pintura para remodelarlo; mantendrá en óptimas condiciones el molino nixtamal para poder darle un mejor servicio a sus clientes, además eso le permitirá atraer más clientes y generar mejores ganancias para continuar siendo un apoyo para su familia.
texts.en: Ada is a woman who is very thankful because with the previous loan she was able to change the style of life for herself and her family. She now also helps her husband a lot more with the household expenses. She is asking for another loan to strengthen her business that consists of a corn mill and a store for basic household items. She will buy belts, gasoline, hoppers for the mill and paint to refurbish it. She will keep her corn mill in optimal conditions to be able to give her customers a better service. This will also allow her to attract more customers and to get better earnings to continue being a support for her family.

loans.use: to buy belts, gasoline, hoppers for the mill and paint to refurbish it. She will keep her corn mill in optimal conditions.

loans.name: Yusufa

texts.en:
Yusufa is a maize farmer from Badamasi village. As a Babban Gona member, Yusufa is excited to have access to a trained agronomist and superior inputs that will give him the chance to achieve high yields of up to 8 Metric Tonnes of Maize per Hectare of Land, 5.5 times higher than the average Nigerian farmer. 
Before joining Babban Gona, Yusufa would have had to sell his maize at harvest, when the price of maize is at it’s lowest, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. As a Babban Gona member Yusufa can to store the maize he harvests and delay it’s sale until a period later on in the season when he can obtain the best price for his maize at a premium of up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.
Thanks to the support from Babban Gona’s marketing services, Yusufa no longer feels the pressure to sell his  maize at low harvest prices. With the opportunity to earn up to $2000 per Hectare of land, Yusufa hopes to realize better yields and plans on using his  additional income to build a house for his family.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Aliymahan

texts.ru: Алиймахан, 61 год, замужем, есть сын. Образование у Алиймахан среднее. По характеру очень жизнерадостная, ответственная и целеустремленная женщина. В течении уже 7 лет она занимается животноводством и полеводством. В хозяйстве есть 2 коровы и 24 овцы. На участке мерою 1,09 Га она выращивает экологически чистую кукурузу и пшеницу. Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Алиймахан обратилась в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 7 ягнят для откорма и перепродажи. На прибыль от кредита Алиймахан и дальше будет развивать свое дело.
texts.en: Aliymahan is 61 years old, married, has a son. She has completed secondary education. She's a very cheerful responsible and ambitious woman. For seven years she has been breeding livestock and cultivating  plants. She owns to cows and 24 sheep. On the land lot of 1.09 ha she cultivates  environmentally friendly corn and wheat. To further develop her business, Aliymahan turned to Bai Tushum Bank for loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy seven lambs for fattening and subsequent resale. She will invest the borrowed money to promote her undertaking.

loans.use: to buy seven lambs for fattening and subsequent resale

loans.name: Ana Del Carmen

texts.es: Ana es una mujer trabajadora de 31 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia y humilde junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijas de 9 y 13 años y un varón de 16 años de edad, que se encuentran estudiando.  Ella es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica a prestar sus servicios en una empresa, pero aprovechando a sus compañeros de trabajo y sus vecinos también vende productos de belleza por catálogo, lo que le permite obtener mejores ingresos. Ana desea invertir en su negocio de venta de productos de belleza, porque en época navideña las ventas son mejores, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: productos de belleza, ropa para dama y zapatos para aumentar su negocio.
texts.en: Ana is a hard-working woman, 31 years old, who lives in her own humble house with her husband and their 2 daughters, ages 9 and 13, and a son, age 16, who are students.  She is a hard-working woman who works as an employee at a business. But, making the most of her coworkers and her neighbors, she also sells beauty products from a catalog, which allows her to get more income. Ana wants to invest in her business selling beauty products because in the Christmas season sales are better, so she asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in beauty products, women's clothing and shoes to expand her business.

loans.use: to invest in beauty products, women's clothing and shoes to expand her business.

loans.name: Yasmin Elizabeth

texts.es:
Yasmin, es una mujer casada actualmente vive con su esposo y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la venta de medicina natural, ya tiene tres años de dedicarse a esta actividad y tiene la ventaja que es una persona muy reconocida en su lugar de domicilio, por lo que las personas confían en los productos que ella ofrece.
Yasmin solicita un crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de analgésicos, vitaminas, jarabes, y otros productos para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y de esa manera poder obtener más ingresos económicos que le ayudaran a darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
Yasmin sueña con darle una buena educación a su hija y que sea una persona de bien para la sociedad.
texts.en:
Yasmin is a married woman, currently living with her husband and children. She works selling natural medicine, has been dong this work for three years, and has the advantage that she is a very well-known person in the place where she lives, so that people trust the products that she offers.

Yasmin asks for a loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of painkillers, vitamins, syrups and other products to satisfy her customers' needs and in this way be able to get more income that will help her to give her family a better quality of life.

Yasmin dreams of giving her daughter a good education and that she becomes a good person for society.

loans.use: to purchase painkillers, vitamins, syrups and other products to satisfy her customers' needs.

loans.name: Marvin Noe

texts.es: Marvin es un joven trabajador que a sus 23 años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo de 1 año y 9 meses de edad, que es su mayor alegría. Él es un joven muy responsable que se gana la vida prestando servicios varios en una empresa de la zona, lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su familia. Marvin desea mejorar el techo de su vivienda, ya que este se encuentra deteriorado, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para mejorar el techo y proteger a su familia de las lluvias.
texts.en: Marvin is a hardworking young man. He is 23 years old and lies with his life's companion and their son, who is a year and 9 months, and who is his biggest happiness. He is a very responsible young man who makes a living by performing different services in an area business. This allows him to support his family. Marvin wants to improve the roof on his home, because it is in poor condition. To do this, he is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in galvanized sheeting, wood and nails to improve the roof and protect his family from the rain.

loans.use: to invest in galvanized sheeting, wood and nails to improve the roof and protect his family from rain.

loans.name: Ever Aliel

texts.es:
Ever, de 43 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, no tuvo la oportunidad de formarse profesionalmente, está acompañado y tiene 4 hijos.

Ever, tiene mucha experiencia como albañil, electricista y en reparación de motocicletas y bicicletas y a través de estos oficios lleva el sustento diario para su familia.

Ever, necesita el préstamo para comprar repuestos para bicicleta y aceites para motocicletas para colocar un pequeño taller de reparación.

El sueño de Ever, es que sus hijos sean profesionales y tengan su propia casa.
texts.en:
Ever, 43 years old, went to school up to ninth grade. He didn't have the opportunity to get professional training. He is partnered and has 4 children.

Ever has a lot of experience as a bricklayer, electrician and in repairing motorcycles and bicycles and, through these trades, he brings the daily sustenance to his family.

Ever needs the loan to purchase bicycle parts and oils for motorcycles to establish a small repair shop.

Ever's dream is that his children become professionals and have their own houses.

loans.use: to purchase bicycle parts and motorcycle oils to establish a small repair shop.

loans.name: Nadia Yuriku

texts.es:
La socia Nadia  es una joven que tiene 20 años y  se dedica a trabajar vendiendo productos de belleza,como perfumes, cremas, champús , entre otros productos.Con estos productos se sustenta a diario, sus sueños es salir adelante con su pequeño negocio.

La socia Nadia pertenece al banco “SILKINCHANY” , ella solicito el préstamo para comprar cremas de belleza, perfumes y colonias. Nadia  está muy agradecida con los inversionistas de KIVA por confiar en ella y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas del crédito puntualmente.
texts.en:
Nadia is a young woman who is 20 years old. She works selling beauty products such as perfumes, creams, shampoos, and more. With these products, she supports herself. Her dream is to get ahead with her small business.

Nadia belongs to the “SILKINCHANY” bank. She is asking for the loan to buy beauty creams, perfumes and colognes. Nadia is very grateful to the Kiva investors for putting their trust in her, and she committed to making her payments on time

loans.use: to buy beauty creams, perfumes and colognes.

loans.name: Mirna Lorena

texts.es:
Mirna, es acompañada, vive con su pareja y ambos han procreado tres hijos los cuales dependen económicamente de ellos, Mirna se dedica a la venta de hot dog y lo hace desde hace varios años, lo atiende sola y no ha tenido preparación académica para realizar esta actividad.
Solicita un crédito para poderlo invertir en la compra materia prima para la elaboración de hot dog como: embutidos, aderezos, pan, aceite, tomates, etc., a la vez pagara la modificación del coche para poder freír papas; esto le permitirá diversificar su negocio, aumentar sus ventas y generar más ingresos económicos para darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
El sueño de Mirna es poder aumentar la capacidad de su negocio para poder continuar ayudando al crecimiento de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mirna is married and lives with her spouse. Both of the have three children who depend on them financially. Mirna sells hot dogs and she has done this for several years. She works alone and she didn't go to school to do this activity.

She is asking for a loan to invest it in buying ingredients to make hot dogs, such as meat, toppings, bread, oil, tomatoes, etc. She will also pay to modify the cart to be able to fry potatoes. This will allow her to diversify her business, increase her sales, and generate more income to give her children a better quality of life.

Mirna's dream is to be able to increase her business' capacity so that she can continue to help her children's growth.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make hot dogs, such as meats, toppings, bread, oil, tomatoes, etc., as well as pay to modify the cart to fry potatoes.

loans.name: Jose Nelson

texts.es: José es un hombre trabajador de 44 años de edad que se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace más de 30 años, con lo cual ha logrado sostener a su familia durante tantos años. Él vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo de 14 años de edad en vivienda humilde pero propia, desde hace 11 años, por lo que se siente muy feliz. José desea reparar sus trasmallos y redes, para mejorar la pesca y sus ingresos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación de sus trasmallos y sus redes para mejorar su pesca y ganancias.
texts.en:
José is a hard-working man of 44 years. He has been earning a living with the craft of fishing for more than 30 years. With this he managed to sustain his family throughout all those years. With his life partner and his 14-year-old son, he has been is living in a humble but their own home for 11 years, which makes him really happy.

José wants to repair his drag nets and other nets to improve his catch and his earnings. This is why he is requesting a loan with FUSAI to invest in repairing his drag nets and other nets to improve his fishing and earnings.

loans.use: to invest in repairing his drag nets and other nets to improve his fishing and earnings.

loans.name: Maria Marleny

texts.es:
Marleny con 43 años de edad,de estado civil casada,vive junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos, en el distrito de Oyotún,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú.Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto laborales como comerciales por parte de los moradores de la zona.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Ella cuenta con negocio referido a la venta de recargas para celulares y locutorio, con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio, negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Solicita préstamo para mejoramiento de infraestructura de local donde se encuentra ubicado su negocio, dicha inversión le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones sus equipos y brindar un mejor servicio, con gran influencia en el negocio. De esta manera piensa mejorar sus servicios para poder atender las diversas necesidades y gustos de los habitantes de la zona.

Marleny es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa. Ha tenido cinco créditos de S/.2000,00, S/.1500,00; S/.2000,00; S/.3000,00 y S/.800,00 los cuáles los a cancelado de manera puntual. Desde que se convirtió en socio de nosotros su negocio ha mejorado y su calidad de vida de igual forma.
texts.en:
Marleny is 43 years old, married and lives with her husband and two children in the Oyotún district in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region of Perú. She has very good references from residents of the region in terms of employment and business. The residents of this place work mostly in agriculture, commerce and livestock.

She has a business recharging cell phones and a call station. She has more than 3 years of experience in this business, which is located in her home. She is requesting a loan for improvements to the infrastructure of the premises where her business is located. This investment will serve to improve the condition of her equipment and offer better service, which will greatly affect her business. In this way, she hopes to improve her services and be able to satisfy the diverse needs and desires of the people living in the area.

Marleny is a recurring member for Edpyme Alternativa. She has had five loans worth 2000, 1500, 2000, 3000 and 800 Nuevos Soles, which she paid off in a timely manner. Since she became our client, her business has improved as well as her quality of life.

loans.use: to improve the infrastructure of the premises where her business is located.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La socia Rosa pertenece al banco comunal “SILKINCHANY” , ella es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora, tiene 30 años y 2 hijos por quienes velar y por quienes trabajar casi todo el día, la socia se dedica a su tienda de abarrotes , su deseo es ampliar su negocio por fin de año.
Rosa  solicito el préstamo para comprar aceite, papa, arroz y azúcar.
 La socia está contenta y complacida con el préstamo porque así ella seguirá adelante y se compromete a cumplir sus cuotas acordadas.
texts.en:
The member, Rosa, belongs to the “SILKINCHANY” village bank. She is a very responsible and hard-working person. She is 30 years old and has 2 children to watch out for and who she works for nearly all day. The member works in her grocery store. She hopes to expand her business for the close of the year.

Rosa requests the loan to buy cooking oil, potatoes, rice and sugar.

The member is happy and content with the loan because this way she can keep moving ahead. She is committed to making the agreed-upon installment payments.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, potatoes, rice and sugar.

loans.name: Cecilia Margarita

texts.es:
Cecilia, comenta que con el apoyo del crédito anterior pudo mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, debido a que las cosechas de maíz y pipianes fueron abundantes y pudo atender las demandas de sus clientes, con ello las circunstancias financieras son más estables.
Nuevamente solicita un crédito para poderlo invertir en la compra de abono, semilla y fertilizante para la preparación de la tierra para cultivar maíz y pipianes, Cecilia considera que la inversión será de gran ayuda, ya que podrá tener mejores cosechas, que le permitirán incrementar sus ganancias y continuar dándole una vida de calidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Cecilia says that with the help of her previous loan she was able to improve her family's living conditions, due to the maize and chili yield being abundant and her being able to better satisfy her customer's demands. Through this the financial circumstances are more stable.

Once again she is requesting a loan to buy manure, seeds, fertilizer for preparing the land to cultivate maize and chilies.

Cecilia thinks this investment will be of great help because she will be able to have better yields, which will allow her to increase her profit and to keep providing a live of quality for her family.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, and fertilizer for preparing the land to cultivate maize and chilies.

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.es:
Fortunata pertenece al banco “SILKINCHANY”, y  su negocio es  de crianza de animales menores como gallinas y cuyes  que los vende en el mercado ; también se dedica al cultivo de hortalizas.
La socia tiene 60 años y 4 hijos, junto con ellos ella desea salir adelante y aporta gastos en su hogar.
 Fortunata solicito el préstamo para comprar maíz y alfalfa.
La socia está contenta y agradece a los inversionistas de KIVA por el crédito y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Fortunata belongs to the “SILKINCHANY” bank, and her business is raising small animals, such as hens and guinea pigs, which she sells at market. She also grows vegetables.

The member is 60 years old and has 4 children. Together with them, she wants to get ahead and contribute to the household expenses.

Fortunata is requesting a loan to buy corn and alfalfa.

The member is happy and grateful to the KIVA investors for the loan, and she promises to make the installment payments.

loans.use: to buy corn and alfalfa.

loans.name: Benito

texts.es:
Benito, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, porque la escuela estaba demasiado lejos y el nivel de pobreza era bastante alto y tenía que trabajar para poder ayudar a generar ingresos para su familia.

Benito, siempre ha trabajado en la agricultura, es por eso que tiene mucha experiencia con el manejo de sus cultivos.

Benito, necesita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes y pesticidas para el control de plagas en sus cultivos.

Benito, sueña con mantenerse cerca de su familia y mejorar las condiciones de vida de ellos.
texts.en:
Benito did not have the opportunity of going to school because the school was too far away, the poverty level was quite high, and he had to work to help generating income for his family.

Benito has always worked in agriculture, which is why he has a lot experience with managing his farm.

Benito needs a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides to control the pests on his farm.

Benito goal is to stay close to his family and to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides to control pests on his farm.

loans.name: Cruz

texts.es:
Cruz, de 63 años de edad, no estudio porque la escuela estaba demasiado, está casada, tuvo 8 hijos pero solo 5 viven con ella porque los otros 3 fallecieron, su esposo y sus hijos se dedican a la agricultura.
	
Cruz, necesita el dinero para comprar abono y pesticidas para las plagas en los cultivos, porque actualmente tiene sembrados 35,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, maicillo, frijol y sandia.

Cruz, suena con que sus hijos sean personas honestas y que se superen.
texts.en:
Cruz is 63 years old. She never studied because the school was too much. She is married and had 8 children, but only 5 live with her because the others died. Her husband and children work in agriculture.

Cruz needs the money to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the infestations in the crops. She currently has 35,000 square meters of corn, sorghum, beans and watermelon planted.

Cruz dreams of her children being honest people who are able to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the infestations in the crops.

loans.name: Rafael Alfonso

texts.es: Rafael de 23 años es un microempresario que reside en un barrio al sur de Barranquilla y se dedica a la elaboración de cocteles de mariscos, este negocio ha sido una actividad tradicional en su familia y que decidió acogerla como su propio negocio con excelentes resultados.  Diariamente recorre las calles del municipio ofertando las preparaciones de los cocteles con diferentes frutos del mar; camarón, ostras, pulpo, almejas y pescados, labor que le garantiza un ingreso seguro para su sustento. Rafael está separado y es padre de un niño de 4 años de edad a quien brinda bienestar.  Rafael tiene muy buenas ventas y desea comprar al por mayor los mariscos, para ello realizó una solicitud de crédito, un credikiva, oportunidad para vincularse a la vida financiera a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y manejar un inventario surtido de camarones, almejas, ostras y pulpo, ingredientes principales de sus cocteles.  Su meta es comprar su casa propia y poder tener más carritos para distribuir en varias zonas de la ciudad.
texts.en:
Rafael is 23 years old and a micro-entrepreneur. He is living in a neighborhood of Barranquilla, and earns a living by making seafood cocktails. This trade is a traditional one in his family and he has chosen to start his own business with excellent results.

Every day, he walks through the town's street offering to prepare his cocktails with different seafood such as shrimps, oysters, octopus, clams, and fish.

This work guaranties him a stable income to sustain himself. Rafael is divorced and father of a four-year-old boy for whom he provides.

Rafael has good sales and wants to buy the seafood at wholesale, which is why he is requesting a loan with Kiva. It is an Opportunity to connect to the financial life through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation and maintain an assortment of shrimps, clams, oysters and octopus - the main ingredients of his cocktails.

His goal is to buy his own house and to be able to own more carts to distribute in different parts of the city.

loans.use: to stock up on shrimps, clams, oysters, and octopus.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is 45 years old and married with three children. Two children are still in school. Vivian works very hard to provide for them. Vivian runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, noodles, and other snack foods.

Vivian has been in this business for 7 years. In the future Vivian would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products,  milk, coffee, drinks, spices, noodles, and other snack foods

loans.name: Maria Esneda

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 59 años de edad, la cual se dedica a la venta de alimentos, es una persona muy luchadora, que inició un sueño de empresa y hoy podría estar a punto de dar el paso más importante en su empresa, dado que actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual será destinado en la compra del registro invima y registro de su empresa y marca en cámara de comercio, paso que resta para llevar sus alimentos a las cadenas de supermercado y certificar sus productos.
Ella está feliz y emocionada y espera recibir tu apoyo y celebrarlo junto a su familia la certificación de su empresa.
texts.en:
Maria is 59-year-old woman. She is earning a living by selling food.

She is a very hard-working person, who started a dream company and now would be able to take the most important step in her business. Given that she will be granted the loan she is requesting, it will be used to pay for the registration with INVIMA [national institute of food and drug monitoring] and the registration of her business and trademark with the chamber of commerce. This step is remaining for bringing her food to supermarket chains and certify her products.

She is very happy and moved, hoping for your support, and celebrates the certification of her company with her family.

loans.use: to pay for the registration with the food control ministry and the registration of her business and trademark with the chamber of commerce.

loans.name: Rosette

texts.fr: Rosette, âgée de 43 ans, vit en union libre et a 3 enfants scolarisés. Elle vend des produits alimentaires dans une boutique qu’elle a emménagée chez elle. Cela fait plus de 5 ans. Son activité l’aide à contribuer aux nombreuses dépenses familiales. Rosette souhaite augmenter son revenu et pouvoir épargner pour les études de ses enfants. Voulant exploiter les opportunités qu’elle a dans sa zone, elle a fait une demande de microcrédit pour pouvoir augmenter son stock de marchandises.
texts.en:
Rosette is 43 years old, is in a civil union, and has 3 children who all attend school. She sells food products in a shop that she had located in her home over 5 years ago. Her business enables her to contribute towards the many family expenses.

Rosette would like to increase her income and be able to build some savings for her children's education. Wanting to exploit the opportunities that she has in her area, she is requesting a microloan in order to be able to increase her inventory.

loans.use: to buy boxes of spaghetti and boxes of eggs.

loans.name: Sale

texts.en:
Sale is 53 years old and single.

He operates a small convenience store in his village to earn a living. Sale requested a loan to buy a freezer, a box of twistiest, a box of chicken, a sack of flour, a sack of rice, a box of tinned fish, a box of vegetable oil, a box of milk, a box of sausage, and plastic bags, to help him run the business.

He will use his profit to expand his business. He became a member of SPBD in 2010.
